Title: Pitbull e-commerce
Description:
Silverlight E-commerce Project
C#

The Pitbull project will be built on top of a Silverlight business Application.
SQL 2008

Features:
- Membership
- RMA
- PayPal
- Fast search function
- Recommendation built on previously purchases
